messages.INTROA:
Welcome, brave and adventurous one, to the wondrous and magical game of
Kyrandia, Fantasy World of Legends!!  You are about to journey to a fantasy
land far, far away... a land of swords and sorcery where the only limit is
your own imagination.

You will travel to the world of Kyrandia, a fairy tale land of magic and
mystery, realm of the beautiful and powerful goddess of Kyrandia, Tashanna,
the "Lady of Legends."  Here, you begin as a young apprentice from a small
village who seeks to grow in knowledge, wisdom, and power, with high hopes
of being granted the title of "Arch-Mage of Legends" -- the mightiest wizard
of Kyrandia!  To achieve your goal, you must cross the lands of Kyrandia,
face unknown perils, solve mystical enigmas, battle rivalrous mages, and
conqueror your own mind, body, and soul.

Time has stood still for too long on Kyrandia -- now is the time for one
mage to rise above and master the powers of sorcery and magic.


Press ENTER to continue
messages.INTROB:
However, before you begin your adventure, here's a brief explanation of how
to play:

Kyrandia is a multi-player interactive game, where many people at once can
adventure with each other in the same simulated adventure world.  Players
can help one another, engage in battle, trade information, or just "shoot the
breeze."

To move about in Kyrandia, type the direction you want your character to go
(north, south, east or west).  You can speak with other players using action
verbs.  For example, if you were to type "say hello there", other players at
the same location would see "hello there."  You may pick up objects and do
things with them.  You can look at your current surroundings or other players.
Almost any mundane action you can think of can be performed.

However, the world of Kyrandia is much, much more.  The underlying theme of
the entire game is the use of magic.  Similar in concept to the popular
role-playing game "Dungeons & Dragons," players are "magic-users" who start
at level 1 (Apprentice) and advance to higher levels and more powerful magic.

Press ENTER to continue
messages.INTROC:
Although you must be the one to discover all the details (and many there are)
of the magic of Kyrandia, we'll give you a little help to start off with.

Spells are magic cast by players, sometimes at objects or other players.  To
cast a spell a player must first have it memorized.  He must also have
enough spell points to cast it, and must be of high enough level for certain
spells.  Also, some spells require the player to have certain components
(objects) to cast them.  To actually cast the spell, a player must type
"cast" and then the secret incantation of the spell to be cast; sometimes,
a direct object must be included as well, such as "at the elf".

The physical strength and endurance of a player is determined by his "hit
points."  A player's hit points increase as he gains levels or by magical
means.  It is through hit points that most players battle each other; when a
player's hit points reach 0, he is killed, and must start from scratch at the
beginning again.

To see what spells you have memorized and how many spell points you have,
type "spells".  To see how many hit points you have, type "hits".  To see
what objects you are holding, type "inv".  And if you need it, type "help".

Press ENTER to continue
messages.INTROD:
You may ask what great treasure lies in this adventure?  You will run
across many exciting characters and travel through breathtaking scenery.
Beyond that, explore this great world to find what is hidden for you.  The
first player to reach the end will be granted the title of "Arch-Mage of
Legends."

Kyrandia is based upon a complete Fantasy World created by Scott Brinker; it
was programmed by Scott Brinker and Richard Skurnick in March-June of 1988,
and is based on multi-player interactive game concepts originated by Tim
Stryker.  Also, thanks are due to those who gave the support and inspiration
to make this fantasy a reality.  Kyrandia is dedicated to the lonely souls
of the world; type "help fantasy" in the game for more.

Enjoy the magic, mystery, and mirth of Kyrandia, Fantasy World of Legends!

           Kyrandia,V%-4s
     (Fantasy World of Legends)

    Designed and Programmed by -
  Scott Brinker & Richard Skurnick
  (C) 1988-96 by Galacticomm, Inc.
  (C) 2005-21 Elwynor Technologies
         All rights reserved.

Press ENTER to begin
messages.HLPMSG:
Help is available for the following subjects:

  commands ... what you can do
  fantasy .... a note from the author
  gold ....... "money" of Kyrandia
  hits ....... your strength/combat
  levels ..... advancing in Kyrandia
  spells ..... the magic of Kyrandia
  winning .... solving the game

Type "help <subject>" (example: "help fantasy") at the prompt.

To exit type "X".  You will be placed in the same spot when you return.
messages.HLPCOM:
...Suddenly, a small elf runs out from nowhere!  He gives you a nod and a
smile and whispers in your ear...

 Kyrandia is a multi-player fantasy adventure.  You can speak with other
 players using action verbs.  For example, if you were to type "say hello
 there", other players at the same location would see "hello there."

 You can move around the large world of Kyrandia by telling the computer
 which direction you wish to go (example: west).  You can abbreviate these
 commands for your convenience: n(orth), s(outh), e(ast), and w(est).  In
 some instances, you can also use special commands too (example: climb the
 tree).  Also, it is rumored travel can be done magically as well!

 You can pick up objects and use them in assorted ways (you can experiment
 for yourself).  Also, for added novelty, you can do numerous "mundane"
 actions, such as: smile, laugh, kick <Player-ID>, wink, hug <Player-ID>,
 and many more!

 The rest you have to figure out on your own!  Good luck!

***
The elf then bows swiftly to you and disappears in a puff of smoke!
messages.HLPFAN:
It has taken over two years to fully visualize this Fantasy World of
 Kyrandia, a mirror-image of a dreamworld inspired by love and fashioned
 by imagination.  Created with smiles and tears, hopes and fears, and a
 passion of the soul immeasurable by mortal definitions, Kyrandia holds
 a magic beyond sorcery; a magic that will bloom like the lavender roses
 of Kyrandia across time and space forever... love.  This entire work is
 dedicated to my Lady of Legends, the one who dances eternally in my
 dreams; forever alive in my heart and soul, beyond reality, but never
 beyond imagination and hope, over the rainbow, in the fantasy forest where
 wishes come true and the emeralds sparkle in the waterfall forever more.

 Although Kyrandia is an adventure game, filled with action, excitement,
 and interaction, I ask you to also take some time amongst the casting of
 fireballs and battling of monsters to examine the scenery of Kyrandia
 and delve into the deeper meanings of this visionary Fantasy World.

 Thank you so much for partaking in this humble world of mine.  I wish
 you the best of luck, in Kyrandia, and in everything in life.  Farewell.

        Scott James Brinker
    (fantasy author/programmer)
messages.HLPGOL:
...As you ask for a help, a genie suddenly pops out in a cloud of smoke,
smiles, and says to you...

 Welcome to Kyrandia!  I'm so pleased and honored to have you in my humble
 world.  Thank you so, so much for joining this wonderful fantasy land!

 However, you wish to know about gold, huh?  Well, as you've probably
 already concluded, gold is the currency of Kyrandia, similar to the
 "dollar" of your original world.  You can use gold to buy things from
 the many different people you will meet in Kyrandia, or for other,
 more arcane purposes.

 To get gold, well, you have to get it the hard way -- find it.  Or, if
 you're a good alchemist, you might be able to make it?  Ah, well that's
 up to you to discover.  If you're having trouble finding gold out in the
 vast wilderness of Kyrandia, you could always try and get a job.  Rumor
 has it many village store keepers are always looking for good adventurers.

 Anyway, hope I've been of some assistance, but I have to run for now.  Have
 a great time, and I bid you well on all your adventures in Kyrandia!

***
The genie disappears in a flash of forked, blue lightning!
messages.HLPHIT:
...As you make your request for some aid, an old, wise man suddenly appears
before you, gives you a small grin, and says...

 "Hit points" are the representation of your character's strength, health,
 and endurance.  When your hit points reaches zero, your character dies.
 As you grow in power (gain levels) your number of hit points increase.

 You combat with people through the use of magic, ultimately to bring their
 hit points to zero.  You can use spells or magical items, but the result is
 usually the same.  However, if you wish to be really slick, you can also
 attack people in other ways besides lowering their hit points -- I'll leave
 it up to you to discover how...

 You can also combat with the many different creatures of Kyrandia, but you
 best beware: their power is often way beyond your magic!

 When a character dies, he (or she) is automatically restarted at the very
 beginning of the game, near the willow tree, at level 1.

***
The old man then gives you a respectful bow and vanishes in a puff of smoke,
but not before grinning to himself.
messages.HLPLEV:
...As you call out for help, a flash of incredibly bright light blinds you!
***
Before you stands the Goddess Tashanna, shining in sheer beauty.  She kisses
your check and says...

 Your power is measured in "levels" in Kyrandia, which determine how many
 "hit points" you have, how many "spell points" you have, and how powerful
 of spells you may cast.  You gain 2 spell points per level, and you gain
 4 hit points per level.  (see "help spells" and "help hits").  Each level
 also has a "title", or name, associated with it.  For example, when you
 start at level 1, you are titled "Apprentice"; to win the game, you must
 become an "Arch-Mage of Legends".  (see "help winning").

 It is up to you to discover exactly how many levels there are, and their
 respective titles.  However, everyone wears a "Patch of Sorcery" which
 declares their title (type "look <so-and-so>").  You may also look at
 yourself to admire your own title too.

 Above all else, remember... some things are more powerful than magic!

***
The Goddess Tashanna then smiles at you, and vanishes in a purple flash!
messages.HLPSPE:
...A tall, ominous wizard dressed in deep blue robes suddenly appears before
you in a column of orange flame!  He bows to you and begins to speak...

 Kyrandia is a world of magic.  To become powerful in Kyrandia, you therefore
 must master the art of spellweaving.

 The spell system of Kyrandia works like this: every player has a "spellbook"
 in which he keeps the spells he can memorize; no one can steal this
 book, and the player cannot lose it.  Once a spell is in the spellbook, a
 player may memorize that spell (type: memorize <spell name>).  You can have
 up to ten spells "memorized" at the same time.  A player then may cast any
 spell he has memorized (type: cast <spell name>).  Some spells also
 require a direct object (a target), such as a person, place, or thing; the
 direct object should be placed right after the spell name when being cast.
 Also note that some spells require certain components (objects) or other
 special circumstances to be successfully cast.

 You must also be of a certain level to cast different spells; the most
 powerful spells can only be cast by those of high enough level.

***
The wizard then bows and vanishes into thin air!
messages.HLPWIN:
...An image of the author, Scott Brinker, appears in a shimmering circle of
rainbows!  He smiles and says...

 To "win" Kyrandia, you must master the magic of this world and gain the title
 of "Arch-Mage of Legends".  Upon reaching this high level, you are eligible
 to collect any prize the System Operator of this realm may be offering.  The
 game will notify you of how to collect your prize and glory.  Let it be
 known that only the FIRST player to solve Kyrandia (on this system) may be
 the one to receive the prize.

 However, everyone who takes part in the experience of Kyrandia can win; if
 not a materialistic award of credits, then many hours of enjoyable gaming,
 the thrill of magical Dungeons & Dragons combat, and special insight into a
 dreamworld created from true love -- an enchanting, parallel fantasy of the
 world of reality in which we all live.

 I'm sorry, but I can't give you any "hints" or "solutions", because after
 all, that would take away all the excitement and adventure I've created for
 you!  However, I do suggest you see with your heart as well as your eyes...

***
He then shakes your hand, smiles again, and vanishes in his iridescent circle
of rainbows.

he has spent in the world.   Sewn in a unique shade of blue is a Patch of
Sorcery which reads "Arch-Mage of Swords".  He appears to be holding
messages.MDES23:
...As you gaze into his eyes, you feel as though %s were beckoning you
to some greater cause or to perhaps warn you of some kind of impending doom.
You are left with an unsure feeling of your meaning or the meaning of life as
it exists.  Neatly sewn in white threads upon his right shoulder is a Patch of
Sorcery which reads "Arch-Mage of Jewels".  He appears to be holding
messages.MDES24:
...As you look upon %s, an incredible feeling of weakness overcomes you.  You
feel as though you have no value compared to anything else in the world.  You
can detect tremendous energy radiating from within the area.  Sewn ever so
neatly and carefully onto his right shoulder in multicolor threads is a unique
Patch of Sorcery which reads "Arch-Mage of Legends".  He appears to be
holding
messages.FDES00:
...%s is a simple, although rather beautiful, young woman.  Something
in her eyes fills your soul with peace and comfort.  Her smile is perhaps the
most powerful magic she possesses, especially since she doesn't even bear a
Patch of Sorcery -- a lowly apprentice.  She seems to be holding
messages.FDES01:
...%s is a charming lady, wearing well-kept light green robes which flow
elegantly around her figure.  You notice a mysterious twinkle in her eye.
She wears a Patch of Sorcery woven in light brown threads, which reads
"Magic-user".  She seems to be holding
messages.FDES02:
...An air of egotism surrounds %s, who holds her head high and walks
tall and proud.  You seem to find something ironically humorous in her
behavior, and something extremely hilarious about her wardrobe.  Although
she is wearing a fine light green robe, it has a very large hole in the
rear.  Her Patch of Sorcery has "Evoker" woven in brown threads.  She seems
to hold
messages.FDES03:
...%s is dressed in a long white gown.  Gently inserted between the light
threads of her hair is a lavender rose.  A pleasant smile and a sparkle in her
eyes are her most notable traits.  A Patch of Sorcery labeled "Conjurer is sewn
in silver threads to her gown.  She seems to be holding
messages.FDES04:
...Dressed in a heavy dark cape, %s sticks out in the crowd.  Lightly
sprinkled upon the cape is a substance of silvery dust.  You detect a strong
aura of magical power which makes you very weary of this person.  Sewn by black
threads on the side of the black cape is a Patch of Sorcery inscribed with the
word "Magician".  She seems to be holding
messages.FDES05:
...Dressed as though she just cleaned the hut, %s looks as though she
has had better days.  A terrible look of despair can be seen in her eyes.
Bearly attached to her rags by red threads is a Patch of Sorcery titled
"Mystic".  She seems to be holding
messages.FDES06:
...Dressed in fine white satin, %s is truly a proud person.  An air of
true elegancy can be detected, although there is something solemn about her.
Sewn onto her right sleeve by light blue threads is a Patch of Sorcery labeled
"Enchanter".  She seems to be holding
messages.FDES07:
...%s gives you the impression of being a walking advertisement for a
barbarian clothing store.  She's wearing leather armor with several gold
metal bands and spikes sticking out from assorted places -- an ancient birth
control garment.  On the back of her leather outfit a Patch of Sorcery sewn
by yellow threads reads "Warlock".  She appears to have
messages.FDES08:
...Elegantly dressed in black and silver robes, %s stands tall and
proud, radiating an aura of magnificence and power.  Her dark eyes are deep
with mystical secrets un-interpretable by a mere glance.  A Patch of Sorcery,
titled "Sorcerer", is sewn by white threads into the black left arm of her
robes.  She seems to have
messages.FDES09:
...Clothed in solid green robes with a green hat and green saddles to boot,
%s is a stout, middle-aged woman who has a look of determination imbedded
within her grim countenance.  A Patch of Sorcery, sewn by bright green
threads, has been inscribed with the words "Green Wizard".  She seems to be
holding
messages.FDES10:
...Dressed in solid blue apparel, %s is a tall, proud wizard with a
large, silver hat, styled in the traditional magic-user cone shape.  A twinkle
in her eye and a slight smile on her face, which almost makes you wonder
what she has running through her mind.  She wears a dark blue patch which
reads "Blue Wizard".  She seems to be holding
messages.FDES11:
...%s is draped in fine, red silk robes which cover her in complete,
royal attire.  An almost ageless mysticism surrounds her, charming you with
it's magical touch of mystery.  A bright red patch reads "Red Wizard" on her
right shoulder.  She appears to hold
messages.FDES12:
...Tall and quite lean, %s is an incredible wizard, with a determined
look in her young, yet wise countenance.  Although she looks somewhat
inexperienced you notice on her right sleeve a silvery grey patch reads
"Grey Wizard".  This is indeed an experienced soul.  She appears to be holding
messages.FDES13:
...Broad-shouldered and rather strangely built for a women, %s looks like
she was been battling often with some of the more difficult creatures in this
region.  Sewn onto her left sleeve in off white threads is a Patch of Sorcery
which reads "White Wizard".  She appears to be holding
messages.FDES14:
...Worn out from her many difficult battles, %s has a look of exhaustion
on her beautiful, but dirty, face.  As you look closer, you are able to detect
a strong magical aura.  This beauty is indeed very powerful.  Magically
attached to her left arm in magenta threads is a Patch of Sorcery which reads
"Mage".  She appears to be holding
messages.FDES15:
...%s is draped in a dark blue robe which is decorated with many
runic symbols and mystical letters.  Her smile has a somewhat evil appearance,
and her red eyes do startle you.  Long, black hair falls down across her
shoulders, giving her a wild look.  Sewn onto the robe in bright pink threads
is a Patch of Sorcery which reads "Mage of Ice".  She appears to be
holding
messages.FDES16:
...%s looks like a very nice lady, and beauty is most definitely one of
her better traits.  You sense a warm, loving appreciation of life flowing
from her magical aura. A matching Patch of Sorcery sewn in brown reads
"Mage of Wind".  She appears to be holding
messages.FDES17:
...%s is a beautiful young mage who has endured many hardships.  A superb
example of determination and will power, she stands tall and proud, fearing
nothing.  You wonder if this is wise, considering the current conditions
of constant danger.  A Patch of Sorcery sewn in golden threads reads
"Mage of Fire".  She appears to be holding
messages.FDES18:
...Catching your eye immediately is the bright shinny smile of %s.  Her
golden blonde hair blows gently in the light breeze.  You can feel the
presence of this lady in your every thought.  Sewn onto her left sleeve
in orange threads is a Patch of Sorcery which reads "Mage of Light".  She
appears to be holding
messages.FDES19:
...%s looks back at you with gentle eyes.  This is indeed a lady.  She
is dressed in a cream colored floor length dress.  A pretty pink ribbon
rises out of her golden brown hair.  On her face is a glowing smile.  You can
tell that this lady has a warm heart.  You feel as though you are in the
presence of the Goddess Tashanna.  Delicately attached to her right sleeve
in amber threads is a Patch of Sorcery which reads "Arch-Mage".  She seems to
be gently holding
messages.FDES20:
...Looking very distracted, %s is a very nervous person.  Looking at
you very suspiciously she does not seem to trust you.  In fact she doesn't seem
to trust any movements and is quite jumpy.   Sewn in black treads to her
chest is Patch of Sorcery which reads "Arch-Mage of Wands".  She appears to be
holding
messages.FDES21:
...Standing before you is a middle aged lady who is starting to show her
age.  %s has small wrinkles appear on her forehead and her hands shake a
bit.  Dressed in a dull green clock, you can detect that she may be hiding
something.  Sewn onto the left shoulder of the clock in yellow threads is a
Patch of Sorcery which reads "Arch-Mage of Staves".  She appears to be
holding
messages.FDES22:
...%s is a wise old gentlewomen, but a incredible strong magical aura emits
from her.  Her hair is silvery grey in color and her eyes dull from the years
she has spent in the world.   Sewn in a unique shade of blue is a Patch of
Sorcery which reads "Arch-Mage of Swords".  She appears to be holding

...As you gaze into her eyes, you feel as though %s were beckoning you

You are left with an unsure feeling of your meaning or the meaning of life as

...As you look upon %s, an incredible feeling of weakness overcomes you.  You
feel as though you have no value compared to anything else in the world.  You

messages.KID000:
...The ruby is a deep shade of red, and it many facets sparkle brilliantly as
you examine it, enchanting you with its crimson glimmer.  It isn't much bigger
than half your palm, but seems quite heavy for its size.
messages.KID001:
...The emerald is a bright hue of green, and it seems to shine with its own
beautiful, inner light.  It has been naturally shaped into a three dimensional
hexagon, with, strangely enough, perfectly smooth edges.
messages.KID002:
...Small and round, this dark red garnet is one of the more common gemstones
of the land, yet nonetheless, has a certain charm of its own.  Like all of the
garnets which are normally found, there is a tiny black splotch in its center.
messages.KID003:
...The pearl is a lovely little stone, pure white in color, with a shiny
surface that reflects all surrounding light, causing it to sparkle with a
special brilliance of its own.
messages.KID004:
...The aquamarine is a beautiful, light blue gem.  It is shaped like a small
triangle, with darker shades of blue in the center.  Because of its unique
shape, it also acts like a prism, refracting any light that enters it into
vivid, tiny rainbows.
messages.KID005:
...The moonstone is a fascinating, milky-white precious stone no bigger than
your thumb and forefinger.  As you examine it, a strange tingle runs down your
spine and you feel the presence of magic.
messages.KID006:
...The sapphire is a medium-sized gemstone, dark blue in color, except for a
small white spot in its center which shines blazingly -- a star sapphire.  One
of the rarer and more beautiful jewels, you feel power in this royal treasure.
messages.KID007:
...The diamond, the legendary jewel which represents eternal love, is truly
a spectacular wonder to behold.  Its thousands of facets glitter dazzlingly as
you examine it, almost mesmerizing you with their dancing radiance.
messages.KID008:
...The amethyst is a crystalline, purple stone.  Its jagged facets refract
any light into myriad, reddish-blue images which dance almost magically before
your eyes.
messages.KID009:
...The onyx is a smooth, jet black rock about the size of your palm.  Looking
at it closely, it reminds you of a pool of inky water, reflecting surrounding
images with almost mystical clarity.
messages.KID010:
...The opal, strangely enough, doesn't appear to have any color.  In fact,
this gem seems to be almost invisible, barely distinguishable in your hands.
It has a certain, mysterious vibration to its substance.
messages.KID011:
...Dark crimson, streaked with varying shades of red, the bloodstone is a very
mystifying jewel.  Staring at it, you get the feeling that you are somehow
gazing into another dimension.
messages.KID012:
...The elixir is a mysterious, blue-green liquid which radiates a very magical
energy.  A strange, sulfuric odor rises from its watery substance, making you
quite nauseous.
messages.KID013:
...The staff is made from solid oak wood, topped with a silver cone.  It has
a certain regal bearing to its nature, as though it was the scepter of a king.
Mystical symbols have been carved into it, and although they are unreadable,
you feel a mysterious tingle run down your spine as you examine them.
messages.KID014:
...The key is made of solid gold, and it sparkles almost magically as you
examine it.  It is about the size of your fist, although it is quite heavy
due to its substance.  You feel a surge of emotion in your heart for a brief
moment.
messages.KID015:
...The locket is made from shiny gold, polished to perfection and decorated
with many intricate designs.  You particularly notice a beautiful replication
of a magnificent waterfall carved lovingly into its center.
messages.KID016:
...The amulet is a light-blue gemstone set in a silver pendant with a thin
silver chain attached.  The amulet has a mysterious glow to its stone, almost
enchanting you with its soft radiance.  You also notice that the gemstone has
been cut in the shape of a large teardrop, as though symbolic of its origin.
messages.KID017:
...The pendant is made of dull silver with little ornamentation, except
for a rough inscription which reads: "Nothing is impossible, if only you
believe...".
messages.KID018:
...The charm is a small, bright blue jewel which radiates a magical light
from within, creating the image of a bright blue orb of light in your mind.
You feel occasional surges of electric energy erupt from it, delivering mild
shocks to you.
messages.KID019:
...The bracelet has been wrought from pure white gold, a very rare element
indeed.  It sparkles as you examine it closely, almost as though trying to
enchant you with its dancing brilliance.
messages.KID020:
...The coronet is truly a magnificent work of incredible craftsmanship,
apparently once designed to honor the greatest kings and queens of the
many realms of fantasy.  It has a slightly magical aurora to it.
messages.KID021:
...The tiara is a magnificent work of craftsmanship.  It seems to sparkle with
an almost unearthly brilliance as you examine it closely.  You sense something
very special and magical about this beautiful treasure.
messages.KID022:
...The necklace is a wonderfully crafted piece of jewelry, made from the
finest silver and adorned with numerous precious stones, from rubies, to
diamonds, to emeralds.  You feel a certain sense of peace in your soul as
you examine it.
messages.KID023:
...The broach sparkles with dark blue gemstones, radiating an aura of sheer
magical beauty.  It is something to be treasured for the rest of your mortal
life.
messages.KID024:
...This royal artifact, one of the many creations from the great Age of
Alexis, represents the holy symbol of the royal family of Tenderkin to the
south.  You can almost sense the prestige that was once carried with this
beautiful sceptre.
messages.KID025:
...The rod is a long slender metallic object, primarily made from a rare
metal find in Kyrandia.  It is black in color and weighs quite a bit.
messages.KID026:
...The wand is about two feet in length and about half an inch in diameter.
It appears to be constructed from pure silver, although it is much lighter
than you would expect.  A silver tulip entwined within two hearts has been
intricately carved across its length.
messages.KID027:
...This small, silver trinket is hung from a thin, silver chain.  At
first glance, it appears to be worthless, yet you sense a mysterious
force locked within its simplicity.
messages.KID028:
...The soulstone is a large jewel, slightly bigger than your palm.  It has
been carved into the shape of a perfectly symmetrical ellipse.  When glanced
at from a distance, it appears to be only a dull grey in color, but when you
gaze closely, it jumps to life, sparkling brilliant, multi-colored rainbows.
messages.KID029:
...The kyragem is one of the loveliest gems of the entire world, scintillating
with a bright, prismatic splendor.  Although this beautiful jewel is rather
small in size, it radiates an aura of incredible power, filling your soul with
eternal peace and love.  Mystically etched into the center of the stone, you
see the words, "Across time and space forever...", shining blazingly.
messages.KID030:
...The dragonstaff is a great rod, at least six feet in length and about two
inches in diameter.  It appears to have been constructed from solid cedar,
with an exact replica of a small dragon's head placed on its top, its mouth
gaping open.  Strange, unintelligible symbols have been carved in the wood
from top to bottom, and the entire staff radiates powerful magic.
messages.KID031:
...Bubbling and frothing constantly, this pinkish-red potion is most certainly
one of the strangest concoctions in all of Kyrandia.  A distinctive odor of
many potent and mysterious spices emanates from the center of this magical
liquid, tempting you to drink its enchanting substance.
messages.KID032:
...About the size of your palm, this appears to be just an ordinary pinecone.
However, something about it -- you can't figure out what -- leads you to
believe there is a hidden magic to its simple nature.
messages.KID033:
...The dagger is made from pure silver, and it shines with a bright glimmer
as you examine it.  Its hilt is decorated with several small jewels, which add
to the sparkle of this small blade.  An inscription, written in gold, on the
blade reads: "Love Conquers All".
messages.KID034:
...The sword is a beautiful blade forged from the finest metals of the land,
sharpened to a perfect edge, and decorated with many precious jewels of
incredible beauty.
messages.KID035:
...The scroll has been made from fine papyrus paper, although it seems quite
worn and ancient.  A certain magical force surrounds it, and you feel yourself
being magically drawn to reading its mystical symbols.
messages.KID036:
...The codex appears to be a very ancient and magical work, dating back
before the ages of the elders.  Your eyes seem to be drawn to reading its
mysterious symbols.
messages.KID037:
...This powerful book of knowledge radiates an awesome aura of pure
energy, beckoning you to read its mystical language.  An ominous feeling
enters your soul.
messages.KID038:
...The parchment is made from a leathery material which has been rolled up.
After further examination you unroll it and feel some of its magic escape.  You
are compelled to want to read it.
messages.KID039:
...The ring is made of pure gold and flawless in its design.  You can notice
that twelve tiny specks surround it denoting some kind of significance.  This
is the holy symbol of wholeness... oneness... eternal unity.
messages.KID040:
...The rose is a beautiful flower, solid lavender in color, and eternally in
full bloom.  It has lovely fragrance, the most wonderful, natural perfume you
have ever smelled.  This star of natural beauty is also the holy symbol of the
Goddess Tashanna.
messages.KID041: ...The lilac is a small, white flower.
messages.KID042:
...The orchid, strangely enough, seems to be of solid gold.  It sparkles
with a magical brilliance as you examine it, almost enchanting you with its
simple glitter.
messages.KID043:
...The shard is a crystalline, elongated-hexagonal piece of clear quartz.  It
has been magically shaped into the form of a teardrop, representing its
sorrowful origin.  Something about the shard touches the deepest part of your
heart.
messages.KID044:
...The tulip is a delicate flower made of the purest silver.  Something about
the gentle nature of the beautiful work of nature touches your heart.  You can
also detect a sweet odor magically rising from it's shiny petals.
messages.KID045:
...The dryad is a female tree nymph, about four feet tall with long blonde
hair and large, deep blue eyes.  She smiles at you warmly, and bows to you
respectfully.  You also notice a lavender rose placed perfectly in the middle
of her beautiful hair.
messages.AID045:
...The dryad smiles at you, as though understanding your desire, but she
nonetheless dances away from your grasp.
messages.KID046:
...The willow is a large, magical tree, which radiates a mystical power beyond
anything of this world.  Many strange and exotic symbols have been carved
elaborately into the trunk, which read: "-n--l, oh servant of Tashanna, and
pay homage to thy source of life energy, for thy power to be recognized by
the forces of nature and magic."  You notice that the first word has been
partially worn away by time... or something else.
messages.AID046: ...The willow tree doesn't seem to want to move.
messages.KID047:
...The altar has been constructed from the finest marble of Kyrandia, pure
white with a holy radiance to its smooth, shiny surface.  Enscribed in
gold, are the words: "To thou whom seeketh thy power, praise thy power with
all thy heart and soul.  Offer thy wealth generously, for thy physically body
is nothing to thy soul, and glory be to the great goddess alone."
messages.AID047: ...Stealing altars isn't allowed in the realm of Tashanna, foolish mortal!
messages.KID048:
...The sign reads as follows:
   --------------------------
    | Ye Olde Spell Shoppe |
   --------------------------
 ------------------------------
burnup .... 80gp  cantcmeha  100gp
clutzopho . 50gp  cuseme .... 40gp
fpandl .... 60gp  hocus .... 400gp
howru ..... 25gp  koolit .... 60gp
noouch .... 30gp  pocus ..... 45gp
sunglass .. 35gp  thedoc .... 75gp
tiltowait 1000gp  weewillo   120gp
whereami   100gp  zapher .... 50gp
messages.AID048: ...The sign is magically bound to the ground.
messages.KID049:
...The statue is a beautiful work of art depicting a young man and a royal
lady of incredible charm, holding each other close, facing the any obstacles
of the world together.  There is something so life-like about this statue,
it enchants you with a certain magic, filling your heart and soul with an
unending feeling of eternal peace and love.
messages.KID050:
...The shrine is almost completely hidden within the heavy, dark green
underbrush of the forest.  It seems to be constructed from pure silver and
gold, adorned with several sparkling jewels.  Enscribed on the base of
the shrine you see the phrase: "Offer thy treasures here".
messages.AID050: ...Oh, for crying out loud, stop being such a scrounge!
messages.KID051:
...This machine seems to be some sort of gambling system.  There is a slot
in the center of it, with a writing above saying: "Enter Garnet Here".  You
feel a sudden urge to act foolishly.
messages.KID052:
...The dragon is a magnificent, yet horrifying magical creature of darkness.
Its huge body is covered with protective, green scales which seem to almost
shine with a royal beauty.  From its long, ominous spiked tail to its grinning
maw, it strikes both fear and awe into your mortal soul.
messages.AID052:
...Suddenly, the goddess Tashanna appears before you and says: "Now why
would you want to do a STUPID thing like that?"
messages.KID053:
...The altar, constructed from pure marble, stands about four feet high
and at first glance appears completely unadorned.  However, as you examine
it more closely, you are able to see a faded inscription which seems to
read: "Tlho hoe wmkg lhevy mw oeagh azd ymkp, vlzd azd umdi, imk age feadi hm
wafe hoe foappezce hoah pley aoead, desmhe hoiyepw hm hoe hayj ah oazd."
messages.AID053: ...The altar really doesn't seem to want to move.
messages.TIRED:
...You are exhausting yourself!  You need to rest for a few seconds before
continuing...
messages.LVLM00: ...Ah, you've already accomplished that task though!
messages.LVLM01:
***
%s is attempting a magical instant replay!
messages.LVLM02: ...A voice in your mind says, "Ah, it is not yet time, my friend...".
messages.LVL200:
...As you kneel, a vision of the Goddess Tashanna materializes before you.
She lays her hand gently upon your shoulder and says to you, "Rise, rise,
Magic-user!  Your first advancement has begun."  She then vanishes, and
you feel yourself grow in power!
***
You are now at level 2!
***
A spell has been added to your spellbook!
messages.GETLVL:
***
%s seems to suddenly grow in strength and knowledge!
messages.LVL300:
...As you praise the Goddess Tashanna, you feel yourself grow in power!
***
You are now at level 3!
messages.MARRY0:
...What bigamy is this?  You've already sworn your life to %s!  Surely
you have more dedication than that!
messages.MARRY1:
***
%s is looking like a nasty polygamist!
messages.MARRY2:
...Trying to marry yourself, huh?  Sorry, we don't allow that sort of self
pleasure in Kyrandia...
messages.MARRY3:
***
%s is looking somewhat skeptical about a new way of life.
messages.MARRY4: ...You devote the rest of your mortal life in Kyrandia to %s.
messages.MARRY5:
***
%s has decided to devote the rest of %s mortal life in Kyrandia to you!
messages.MARRY6:
***
%s has decided to devote the rest of %s mortal life in Kyrandia to
%s!
messages.MARRY7: ...Feeling somewhat lonely, huh?  Sorry, that person isn't around...
messages.OFFER0:
...The Goddess Tashanna accepts your humble offer and gives you her eternal
blessings!
messages.OFFER1:
***
%s is having holy communion with the Goddess Tashanna.
messages.PINEC0: ...You successfully grab one of the pinecones!
messages.PINEC1:
***
%s has successfully grabbed one of the pinecones from the tree!
messages.PINEC3:
***
%s is trying to grab a pinecone without much success.
messages.BGEM00:
...As you drop the gem into the stump, a powerful surge of magical energy
rushes through your entire body!
***
You are now at level 6!
***
A spell has been added to your spellbook!
messages.BGEM01:
***
%s has just gained in power and knowledge!
messages.BGEM02:
...The gem drops smoothly into the endless depths of the stump.  You
feel a mysterious tingle down your spine, as though you have begun to
unleash a powerful source of magic.
messages.BGEM03:
***
%s is dropping things in the stump.
messages.BGEM04:
...It drops into the endless depths of the stump, but nothing seems to
happen.
messages.BGEM05: ...But you don't have one, you hallucinating fool!
messages.BGEM06:
***
%s, who has apparently been smoking too many magic weeds, is having
hallucinations with the stump!
messages.SILVM0:
...As you offer your fourth birthstone to the Goddess Tashanna, you feel
a powerful surge of magical energy course through your body!
***
You are now at level 4!
***
A spell has been added to your spellbook!
messages.SILVM1:
***
%s seems to grow in strength and power!
messages.SILVM2:
...The Goddess Tashanna accepts the offer of your birthstone!  You feel the
urge to complete the offering with the rest of your birthstones.
messages.SILVM3:
***
%s is making offerings to the Goddess Tashanna!
messages.SILVM4:
...The Goddess accepts your offer, but in your soul you realize that your
offering was not one of your birthstones, or was out of sequence.
messages.SILVM5:
***
You hear the roll of thunder in the distance!  %s is making false
offerings to the Goddess Tashanna!
messages.SAPRAY:
...As you pray, a vision of the Goddess Tashanna appears before you, shining
in her eternal, radiant beauty.  She smiles at you and says: "Oh, brave and
courageous one, there is so much you must learn.  What you have seen is only
a small fraction of the world of Kyrandia... don't let your pride outmatch
your knowledge.  Search for the truth of the four elements of all life, and
know your corresponding birthstones, and their relation to the forces of
nature and magic.  I bid thee the best of luck."  The goddess then vanishes
as mysteriously as she had appeared.
messages.RUBY00: ...You successfully grab one of the rubies!
messages.RUBY01:
***
%s has successfully grabbed a ruby from the tree!
messages.RUBY02:
...You fail to grab a ruby.
***
A snake lunges out from the tree and bites for you for 8 points of damage!
messages.RUBY03:
***
%s tries to grab a ruby, but instead is bitten by a large snake!
messages.DRUID0:
...As you touch the scepter to the orb of light, it vanishes in a flash!
***
A spell has been added to your spellbook!
messages.DRUID1:
***
%s is doing something mysterious with the orb of light!
messages.FEAR01:
...As you boldly defy the evil, the Goddess Tashanna rewards you for your

messages.DIEMSG:
***
Suddenly, everything goes black, and you feel yourself falling through a deep
chasm.  Strange colors flash in your mind and your ears are deafened with the
sound of rolling thunder.  After what seems like an eternity, you finally feel
yourself floating gently to the ground, and your vision returns...

messages.BASMSG:
***

messages.BASMSG1:
***
Suddenly, your skin burns with an invisible fire, wracking your body with

***

***

do feel a little mentally tired.
messages.BASMSG4:
***

then vanishes in a puff of smoke.
***
You feel slightly drained.

***

powerful forces.

messages.PORTAL:
...As you walk into the portal, you are suddenly blinded by spectacular and
colorful images beyond anything you have ever seen before!  As your eyes
start to adjust to the brilliance, a magical scene appears before you...
***
messages.PORTAL1:
You're standing near a beautiful waterfall in the center of an underground
forest.  Memories of young loves appear before you, so realistic you feel as
if you could reach out and touch them.  Your heart begins to race faster and
faster...
messages.PORTAL2:
You're lying in a small, wooden chapel.  Next to you, you feel the warm touch
of your life's eternal love, holding you close.  All you can remember is the
dark wood of the rafters above as you journey to paradise...
messages.PORTAL3:
You're crying on the floor, begging for the return of the love you lost long
ago.  Tears fall like raindrops from your red, swollen eyes as your heart
breaks from the sorrow of losing the meaning and inspiration of your life...
messages.PORTAL4:
You're standing alone in solitude on a dark, windy beach.  You look across the
black horizon remembering times of happiness and peace long ago, as the world
moves on emotionlessly...
messages.PORTAL5:
You're standing by a statue which you dimly recognize in your subconscious, but
your mind is filled with thoughts of determination, inspiration, and above all
else, hope.  You feel a power growing within your soul, as a smile returns to
your face, and a sparkle lights in your eyes...
messages.PORTAL6:
You're flying through the air on the wings of a pegasus, soaring high above
the forest below.  It is the most exhilarating feeling of freedom you could
have ever imagined...
messages.PORTAL7:
You're riding a magical carnival ride, holding the hand of your dearest love.
As you soar through the evening sky, you experience the joy of heaven...
messages.PORTAL8: A single name echos through your mind: Kyra.
messages.PORTAL9:
Voices vibrate through your head, whispering the words: "Across time and
space, I love you forever..."

messages.BMSG00:
***
A nasty, little brownie suddenly runs in from nowhere!
messages.BMSG01:
***
The brownie grabs all your gold, snickers evilly, and kicks you in the shin!
messages.BMSG02:
***
The brownie has just stolen all of %s's gold and kicked %s in the shin!
messages.BMSG03:
***
The brownie steals all your possesions except for your spellbook!
messages.BMSG04:
***
The brownie has just stolen all of %s's possessions!
messages.BMSG05:
***
The brownie runs up to you, grins, jumps in the air, and slaps you in the
face!
messages.BMSG06:
***
The brownie has just slapped %s in the face with an evil snicker!
messages.BMSG07:
***
The brownie then makes a few obscene gestures and disappears in a blink of
the eye!
messages.DMSG00:
***
The dryad smiles at you, bows respectfully, and vanishes in a purplish flash
of light!
messages.DMSG01:
***
The %s that was lying %s vanishes in a puff of purplish mists!
messages.DMSG02:
***
Suddenly, a dryad appears in a purplish flash of light!
messages.EMSG00:
***
Suddenly, a small, green elf jumps from out of nowhere!
messages.EMSG01:
***
The elf smiles at you and hands you %d gold pieces!
messages.EMSG02:
***
The elf has just given %s %d gold pieces!
messages.EMSG03:
***
The elf is whispers something to %s secretly!
messages.EMSG04:
***
The elf then tips his hat to you and vanishes as quickly as he had appeared!
messages.EHINT0:
***
The elf whispers to you: "Travel fast and travel far, thou shall never escape
the wrath of Zar..."
messages.EHINT1:
***
The elf whispers to you: "Understand thy heart, soul, mind, and body..."
messages.EHINT2:
***
The elf whispers to you: "Walk through danger without fear..."
messages.EHINT3:
***
The elf whispers to you: "Cry for those who cannot cry; do not be ashamed of
your tears for those who have been hurt..."
messages.EHINT4:
***
The elf whispers to you: "Seek your power 'cross the great sea on the island
of fantasy..."
messages.EHINT5:
***
The elf whispers to you: "Kyrandia (Fantasy World of Legends) is Copyrighted
(C) 1988-1996 by Galacticomm, Inc. and (C) 2005-2021 by Elwynor Technologies..."
messages.EHINT6:
***
The elf whispers to you: "Powerful is the spell that is not a spell, that can
be cast, but not memorized, and appears in no spellbook... seek this spell..."
messages.EHINT7:
***
The elf whispers to you: "The magic of the forest itself is not something to
be overlooked... the elements of nature hold much power..."
messages.EHINT8:
***
The elf whispers to you: "Answering riddles can open doors, like a key..."
messages.EHINT9:
***
The elf whispers to you: "The soul is the key..."
messages.ZARABO:
***
Suddenly, the sky darkens above you as a shadow of a huge dragon covers you!
You hear ear-shattering screech echo all around you, and you feel a powerful
blast of hot wind which almost knocks you senseless!
messages.ZMSG00:
***
Suddenly, the dragon casts a spell and vanishes in a cloud of black,
acrid smoke!
messages.ZMSG01:
***
Suddenly you hear a ear-piercing screech of rage!
***
A dragon suddenly appears in a cloud of black, acrid smoke!
***
You have the sudden urge to flee in panic!
messages.ZMSG02:
***
Suddenly, the dragon roars out its battle cry!
messages.ZMSG03:
***
Before you can react, the dragon swings its neck and rips at you with
its razor sharp teeth, tearing your chest apart!
messages.ZMSG04:
***
In a blink of an eye, the dragon inhales deeply, and then breathes an
explosion of fire directly at you, boiling your flesh in its searing heat!
messages.ZMSG05:
***
The dragon turns at you in disgust and sheer hatred, and slashes at you
with one of its claws, shredding several of your limbs!
messages.ZMSG06:
***
The dragon pauses for a moment in deep concentration, and then turns to
stare directly at you.
***
Suddenly, a bolt of lightning flies from the creature's claws, smashing
into your chest with a force great enough to pulverize a small village!
messages.ZMSG07:
***
%s has just been brutally attacked by the dragon!
messages.ZMSG08:
...You successfully cast the spell!
***
The dragon roars, turns on you, and lashes at you with its huge, spiked,
powerful tail, crushing you to the ground!
messages.ZMSG09:
***
%s, in a fit of idiocy, magically attacked the dragon, who in turn
crushed %s violently with its tail!
messages.ZMSG10:
***
Suddenly, the dragon vanishes in an explosion of bright orange flames!
messages.ZMSG11:
***
Suddenly, a dragon appears in an explosion of bright orange flames, bellowing
out a roar of anger!
messages.ZMSG12:
...As you rub the staff, the dragon suddenly bellows out a deafening roar
of rage!
messages.ZMSG13:
...As you rub the staff, a deafening crash of thunder erupts and you
feel the ground under you feet begin to tremble!
messages.ZMSG14:
***
The dragon gives you a look of sheer hatred, lunges for you, and rips the
dragonstaff from your hands!
messages.YOUWIN:



...the dragon looks at you with contempt... yet respect.
***
You are now at level 25... Arch-mage of Legends!
***
You fear the dragon no longer...



Congratulations to you, Arch-mage of Legends, you have mastered the magic of
Kyrandia!  Of course, you are now eligible to accept any prize the System
Operator is offering; call the Sysop, at (XXX) XXX-XXXX to collect your
prize (you must be the first caller to be the winner).  However, you have won
more than materialistic treasures, for to have reached this point, you have
experienced a magical journey through the very heart and soul of the author...
and witnessed a visionary fantasy of true love, across time and space forever.
Follow your dreams, for the story of Kyrandia, is one we all live, in one way
or another... and the story will never end.
messages.SHEWON:

Suddenly, the dragon bows respectfully to %s who has now attained
the title of Arch-mage of Legends!
